title: Which is the best soundtrack in Hollywood movies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well that actually depends on your taste buds and palatability for music and for the type of movies too. I'm a kind of person who can listen to any kind n genre of music, just depends on my mood. My music choice ranges from hard core Indian classical to heavy metal songs.  I'll just mention a few notable soundtracks that I simply adore.  First n foremost has to be the matrix. The first movie had music by various rock bands n it was absolutely awesome. This was the first ost that I'd bought.The subsequent 2 movies had as background, trans by Juno Reactor which was actually passable.Definitely maybe- now I sincerely don't remember the entire collection, but I came across the song come as you are by nirvana via this movie. do I need to say more.500 days of summer- each n every song is awesome.Bandslam- again absolutely adorable tracks. Infanct this one movie enlightened me that rock music can be great too(although I adored matrix soundtrack from almost 10 years before this apparition).Mean girlsDevil wears Prada - has some beautiful tracks like Vogue by Madonna and Our remains by Bitter Sweet(I'm truly indebted to SoundHound app for this one).Django unchained.The chef.Music and lyrics- man how can I miss this one.Slumdog millionaire.Many other rom-coms like noting hill, pretty woman, runaway bride, PS I love you, you've got mail have all got great music.

well... there are many good movies with very good sound track. and in the answers to the thread you can find some .
